data.name: VHD_SupportPRSwitchMustBeTrue
data.value: The SupportPersistentReservations switch parameter cannot be set to FALSE when using the Test-VHD cmdlet.

data.name: ConvertVHD_DifferencingDiskMustHaveParentPath
data.value: The destination parent path must be specified when creating a differencing disk.

data.name: InvalidParameter_StaticAndDynamicMacAddressBothPresent
data.value: The network adapter cannot use both a static and dynamic MAC address.

data.name: InvalidParameter_MandatoryFeatureIdAndManagementOS
data.value: Mandatory features cannot be set on a ManagementOS network adapter.

data.name: VMFailover_OnlyValidParameterOnPrimary
data.value: '{0}' is the only valid parameter for a primary virtual machine.

data.name: VramSynth3dVideoAdapter_InvalidOperationOnVramSize
data.value: VRAMSizeBytes is not a supported parameter for virtual machines with configuration version {0}.

data.name: InvalidArgument_ParameterNotRequired
data.value: '{0}' is not required for '{1}'.

data.name: OperationFailed_NotSupported
data.value: The operation is not supported.

data.name: VMSwitch_MoreThanOneFound
data.value: More than one Ethernet switch exists with the name "{0}".

data.name: VMNetworkAdapterAcl_MultipleAddressTypesSpecified
data.value: Only one type of address may be specified at a time.

data.name: SetVMSwitch_TeamingSwitchCannotChangeTypeAndExtNics
data.value: The switch type and member NICs of the VMSwitch with NIC Teaming enabled cannot be changed with Set-VMSwitch.

data.name: NewVM_FailedToRollBack
data.value: Could not delete the virtual machine "{0}" after a failure to configure it. Please remove it manually.

data.name: VMFibreChannelHba_NoVirtualHbaFound
data.value: No virtual Host Bus Adapter could be found with the given criteria.

data.name: VMReplication_CannotModifyIncludedVhdsOnReplica
data.value: Included Vhds cannot be modified on the replica virtual machine '{0}'. You can modify them on the primary virtual machine.

data.name: InvalidParameter_StoragePoolMustBeCreatedWithPath
data.value: Storage resource pools must be created with at least one initial storage path.

data.name: InvalidParameter_OnlyValidParameterForThisParameter
data.value: '{0}' is the only valid parameter that can be passed with the '{1}' parameter.

data.name: Generation2_NoIDESupport
data.value: Generation 2 virtual machines do not support IDE.

data.name: VMSynth3dVideoAdapter_InvalidResolutionBasedOnMaping
data.value: MaximumResolution {0} is not available for a MonitorCount of {1}. Try reducing the MaximumResolution by specifying a value from the set : {{{2}}}.

data.name: NewVM_FailedToGetController
data.value: Failed to retrieve the controller in order to attach the disk for the new virtual machine.

data.name: InvalidParameter_VrssVmbusChannelAffinityPolicyValue
data.value: The VRSS vmbus channel affinity policy is not valid. Affinity policy can be either Weak, Strong, or Strict.

data.name: StartVMTrace_DumpObjectsRequiresVerboseLevel
data.value: The DumpObjects switch can only be specified if the Level parameter is Verbose.

data.name: NewVM_FailedToRemoveNewVhd
data.value: Could not delete the VHD at location "{0}" after a failure to configure the virtual machine. Please remove it manually.

data.name: InvalidParameter_StoragePoolMustBeCreatedAlone
data.value: Storage resource pools must be created alone.

data.name: VMReplication_HardDiskNotAttachedToVM
data.value: Virtual hard disk '{0}' is not attached to virtual machine '{1}'.

data.name: AsJobAndPassthruBothPresent
data.value: The Asjob and Passthru switches cannot be set at the same time.

data.name: VMHardDiskDrive_VirutalPMEM_PassthroughDisksNotSupported
data.value: Physical hard disks cannot be attached to a virtual persistent memory controller.

data.name: StartVMTrace_CannotSetTraceFile
data.value: The trace file cannot be changed when tracing has already started.

data.name: InvalidParameter_SnapshotIDOnlyValidForVHDS
data.value: The SnapshotID parameter is invalid when specified for a virtual hard disk that is not a VHD Set file: "{0}".

data.name: Warning_MustSpecifyPathOrDebuggerMode
data.value: Neither Path or DebuggerMode arguments were specified. No changes will be made.

data.name: InvalidParameter_RemoveAllTeamMember
data.value: Removing all network adapters from a team is not allowed.

data.name: VMSynth3dVideoAdapter_InvalidMonitorCount
data.value: MonitorCount cannot be {0}. Specify a value between {1} and {2}.

data.name: UpdateVMConfigurationVersion_VMVersionMaximum_Warning
data.value: No update was performed for the virtual machine "{0}" because its configuration version is already at the maximum level supported by this server. For clustered servers, the maximum supported configuration version can be limited by the cluster functional level.

data.name: InvalidParameter_PhysicalAndVirtualDiskSettingsBothProvided
data.value: The passthrough disk number cannot be provided at the same time as settings that apply to virtual hard disks.

data.name: InvalidParameter_VrssQueueSchedulingModeValue
data.value: The VRSS queue scheduling mode value is not valid. Queue scheduling mode can be either Dynamic, StaticVmq, or StaticVrss.

data.name: VMFailover_InvalidSnapshot
data.value: '{0}' is not a valid recovery snapshot of '{1}'.

data.name: OperationFailed_InvalidState
data.value: The operation cannot be performed while the virtual machine is in its current state.

data.name: NewVMSwitch_FailedToRollBack
data.value: Could not delete the virtual switch "{0}" after a failure to configure it. Please remove it manually.

data.name: VMReplication_StartTimeOccursTooMuchInFuture
data.value: Scheduled start time for virtual machine should not exceed "{0}" days from now.

data.name: VMReplication_CannotModifySettingsOnReplica
data.value: Replication settings cannot be modified on the replica virtual machine '{0}'. You can modify them on the primary virtual machine.

data.name: ConvertVHD_NonDifferencingDiskCannotHaveParentPath
data.value: The destination parent path cannot be specified when creating a disk that is not a differencing disk.

data.name: InvalidOperation_ShieldingIsEnabled
data.value: The parameter '{0}' may not be disabled if the virtual machine is shielded.

data.name: VMHardDiskDrive_IncompatibleWithPersistentReservations
data.value: This operation is incompatible with a virtual disk that supports SCSI-3 Persistent Reservations.

data.name: VMNetworkAdapter_MoreThanOneFound
data.value: Only one network adapter can be specified at a time.

data.name: ImportVM_FailedValidate
data.value: Unable to import virtual machine due to configuration errors. Please use Compare-VM to repair the virtual machine.

data.name: VMDrive_NoPathSpecifiedWithPool
data.value: The path to the virtual disk must be supplied when setting the resource pool name.

data.name: VMNetworkAdapterRoutingDomainMapping_IsolationModeDoesNotSupportRoutingDomain
data.value: Routing domains cannot be configured on network adapters with IsolationMode of None.

data.name: InvalidParameter_VrssMinQueuePairsCountValue
data.value: The VRSS Min Queue-Pair Count cannot be set to less than 1.

data.name: Warning_VMPmemIsPrerelease
data.value: Virtual PMEM is a preview feature and is not recommended for production use.

data.name: InvalidOperation_NumaSpanningIsEnabled
data.value: The command is not valid because NUMA spanning is enabled on the host "{0}".

data.name: SetVMSwitch_NoNetworkAdapterSpecified
data.value: Either the NetAdapterInterfaceDescription or the NetAdapterName parameter must be specified when setting the switch type to External.

data.name: NewVMSwitch_InvalidSwitchType
data.value: The specified switch type is not valid. Either it was used to specify an external switch or to try to enable SR-IOV on an internal or private switch. To create an external switch, use the NetAdapterInterfaceDescription parameter. SR-IOV is valid only on external switches.

data.name: NoDeviceFound
data.value: No device found to run this cmdlet on.

data.name: VMSwitch_NoSwitchFound
data.value: No Ethernet switch could be found matching the specified criteria.

data.name: InvalidParameter_MissingMacAddressParameter
data.value: The Receiver media access control (MAC) address parameter is missing.

data.name: GetVMSan_NoneFound
data.value: No virtual storage area network can be found by given criteria.

data.name: VMMemoryParameterMixMatching
data.value: Dynamic and static memory settings cannot be specified together. To set maximum memory, minimum memory and buffer settings, turn on Dynamic Memory as well.

data.name: InvalidParameter_PathCannotBeNull
data.value: The Path parameter cannot be null. Specify a valid path and try again.

data.name: VMHardDiskDrive_SupportsPersistentReservations_VirtualPMEMNotSupported
data.value: SCSI-3 Persistent Reservations are not supported with a virtual persistent memory disk.

data.name: VMSwitchExtensionFeature_CannotModifyOrRemoveTemplateFeature
data.value: The advanced feature "{0}" is not attached to a virtual switch or network adapter.

data.name: SetVMNetworkAdapter_ParameterInvalidForManagementOS
data.value: The specified parameters cannot be set for a management OS adapter.

data.name: InvalidArgument_SetVMMigrationNetwork
data.value: You must pass at least one of the NewSubnet or NewPriority parameters.

data.name: MigrationNetworkUnacceptableLoopback
data.value: Hyper-V cannot accept loopback addresses for migration networks.

data.name: VMReplication_StartTimeOccursInPast
data.value: The specified start time is not valid because it occurs in the past.

data.name: InvalidParameter_OneOfMutuallyExclusiveParametersRequired
data.value: Either the '{0}' or the '{1}' parameter must be specified.

data.name: VMGroupMember_NoneFound
data.value: Hyper-V was unable to find a group with the name "{0}".

data.name: InvalidParameter_SourceAndDestinationVhdNameMismatch
data.value: The source and destination file names in the Vhds parameter must match.

data.name: InvalidParameter_MismatchedCredentials
data.value: The 'Credential' parameter must contain one PSCredential that is used for all computers, or one PSCredential for each entry in the 'ComputerName' parameter.

data.name: MetricsDisabledForVM
data.value: Resource metering is not enabled for this virtual machine. Use the Enable-VMResourceMetering cmdlet to enable data collection for this virtual machine.

data.name: VMNetworkAdapterFailoverConfiguration_IPSettingsSpecifiedWithoutAddress
data.value: The parameter '{0}' requires an IP address. Specify an IP address and run the command again.

data.name: Generation2_NoFloppySupport
data.value: Generation 2 virtual machines do not support floppy drives.

data.name: Warning_CannotDeleteRootDiskForVHDSet
data.value: The system cannot delete the source virtual hard disk file as it is the root VHD for the new VHD Set file.

data.name: VMHardDiskDrive_NoPathSpecified
data.value: The path to the virtual disk must be supplied when setting the resource pool name, IOPS limits, or persistent reservations support.

data.name: GetVMResourcePool_NoneFound
data.value: No resource pool can be found by given criteria.

data.name: InvalidArgument_ReplicationFrequencyNotValid
data.value: The frequency at which changes will be sent for extended replication should be greater than the frequency for primary replication on the replica virtual machine.

data.name: Warning_CredSSP
data.value: You must log off and log on again to use the selected virtual machine migration authentication type.

data.name: VMReplication_AuthorizationEntryNotFound
data.value: Unable to find an authorization entry for the given primary server.

data.name: NewVMSan_NamesMismatched

data.name: VMReplication_ActionNotApplicableOnReplica

data.name: VMReplication_UseBackup_ScheduledTime
data.value: Back-up can be used only while rescheduling the initial replication.

data.name: VMNetworkAdapterFailoverConfiguration_NotSupportedAdapter
data.value: The selected TCP/IP settings for failover are not valid for legacy type of virtual network adapters.

data.name: InvalidParameter_AddNicToMultipleVMSwitches
data.value: Member adapter(s) cannot be added to mulitple VMSwitches.

data.name: InvalidParameter_RemoveNonExistingTeamMember
data.value: The network adapter '{0}' does not exist in the team.

data.name: MigrationNetworkUnacceptableLinkLocal
data.value: Hyper-V cannot accept link local addresses for migration networks.

data.name: StopVM_SaveAndTurnOffBothSpecified
data.value: The Save and TurnOff parameters are mutually exclusive.

data.name: InvalidParameter_InvalidDiskNumberForDiskObject
data.value: No mounted disk object has the given disk number.

data.name: NewVMSan_WorldWideNameFormatError

data.name: NumaSpanningChangeNeedsVmmsReboot
data.value: You must restart the Hyper-V Virtual Machine Management Service to apply the changes.

data.name: InvalidParameter_UnableToResolveToSingleFile

data.value: '{0}' is not an existing virtual hard disk file.

data.value: Parameters incompatible with PMEM devices have been supplied to the cmdlet.

data.name: VMFibreChannelHba_MultipleHbasFoundMatchingCriteria
data.value: Multiple virtual Host Bus Adapters were found with the same set of world wide names.

data.name: VMReplication_InvalidExtendedReplicationFrequency

data.name: VMSynth3dVideoAdapter_InvalidVramSize
data.value: VRAMSizeBytes cannot be {0}. Specify a value from the set : {{{1}}}.

data.value: Only one subnet can be edited at a time.

data.name: VMHardDiskDrive_StorageQos_PassthroughDisksNotSupported
data.value: Storage Quality of Service is not supported on a physical hard disk.

data.name: InvalidParameter_InvalidFormat

data.name: InvalidParameter_VMReplicationServer_ListenerPortMappingShouldBeUsed

data.name: InvalidParameter_InvalidBandwidthReservationMode

data.name: VMHardDiskDrive_VirutalPMEM_CacheOverrideNotSupported
